item.title: New stable build (99) available
item.description: A new stable build has been released. To download, please visit the homepage. Please note that the name of the main jar file has changed with this release! Please make sure to replace all local files with the distribution files and delete the obsolete files Workbench.jar and JWorkbench.exe
item.author: Thomas Kellerer
